subject: Climate & Environment
title: The E-Waste Mountain
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The E-Waste Mountain.

hook.text: The world generates 62 million tons of electronic waste per year. Less than 20% is recycled.

buildup.text: Phones, laptops, TVs, and appliances are replaced faster than ever before.

punchline.text: Our newest technology becomes someone else's oldest poison.
